Function# IOTryLock

macOS 10.0+

```
boolean_t IOTryLock(IOLock *lock);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/1553012-iotrylock#see-also)

### [Mutexes](/documentation/kernel/1553012-iotrylock#mutexes)

[`IOLockAlloc`](/documentation/kernel/1553021-iolockalloc)Allocates and initializes a mutex.[`IOLockInitWithState`](/documentation/kernel/1553028-iolockinitwithstate)[`IOLockFree`](/documentation/kernel/1553034-iolockfree)Frees a mutex.[`IOTakeLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553007-iotakelock)[`IOLockLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553000-iolocklock)Lock a mutex.[`IOUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1552994-iounlock)[`IOLockTryLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553018-iolocktrylock)Attempt to lock a mutex.[`IOLockUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1553006-iolockunlock)Unlock a mutex.[`IOLockWakeup`](/documentation/kernel/1553016-iolockwakeup)[`IOLockSleep`](/documentation/kernel/1553026-iolocksleep)Sleep with mutex unlock and relock[`IOLockSleepDeadline`](/documentation/kernel/1553030-iolocksleepdeadline)[`IOLockGetMachLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553008-iolockgetmachlock)Accessor to a Mach mutex.
